content:
I think I have a good understanding of how the Eisenhower Matrix works. I'll definitely try to apply it to my daily tasks and see how it helps me prioritize my work. One thing I'm wondering is, how do I handle tasks that seem to be in multiple quadrants? For example, responding to emails might be both urgent and important, but also urgent but not important depending on the context. How do I determine which quadrant it belongs to?
Please respond.
